title: GotoAnnaMaria
body:
"Thank you discipulus!"


"Oh no my books must have fallen when I was attacked by that beast."

[[ Help |Helper]]   [[ Don't do anything|Slacker]]

title: Helper
body:
Help Anna Maria pick up the books

[[Give Quill|Give Quill button]]

title: Slacker
body:
Anna Maria picks up the books.

 [[Give Quill|Give Quill slacker]]

title: conversationmaria
body:
"I even  have to take classes hidden behind a curtain because of those bullies.

But it's not that all bad, Professor Voetius has been very kind in helping me join the University."


Anna Maria leaves 


See book on the ground

 [[pick up book|pick up book button]]

title: Pick up book slacker
body: See Buys Ballot on the cover

title: Give Quill slacker
body:
Anna Maria takes the quill and silently leaves 

See book on the ground

[[Pick up book|Pick up book slacker]]

title: Give Quill button
body:
"Oh thank you. 

 You shouldn't help me, the other students might bully you too if they see you help me."


 [[I don't care about bullies|conversationmaria]] [[No problem! Happy to help!|conversationmaria]]

title: pick up book button
body: See Buys Ballot's name on the cover of the book
